content:
We’re pleased to announce our first ever SuperTuxKart Super Gopher Tournament! We’ll be hosting four matches as we race along the tracks to determine a winner for this year’s tournament! Come join us and challenge your friends in this amazing race!

Our first match will be on March 20 @ 8PM via Zoom. We’ll be posting details in the future, and the Zoom link with password will be available here, on Gopherdon.

card.title: Release v3.3.0 · tootsuite/mastodon
card.description:
Upgrade overview
This release contains upgrade notes that deviate from the norm:
ℹ️ Requires streaming API restart
ℹ️ Requires review of Sidekiq queues in multi-process setups
ℹ️ Requires two-step ...

content:
The Gopherdon team would love to hear your feedback about Gopherdon and what you look for in a Goucher social network! Please take a short survey below to help us learn more about what Goucher needs in a social network, what’s working, etc.

📝 Take the survey: https://<;/span>forms.gle/zeq6MqPK9ZTj8f5UA

account.note: The administrator account for Gopherdon. Currently managed by @marquiskurt.

card.title: Gopherdon Survey
card.description:
Thank your for taking the time to fill out this short survey about Gopherdon (https://mastodon.goucher.edu). Feedback is very important to us because it helps understand what's working well, what needs improvement, and what we can do to help make Gopherdon better suited for the Goucher community.

None of the information you provided will be shared with anyone outside of the Gopherdon administration/moderation team, and this data will not be used other than the intended purpose of investigating where we can improve Gopherdon.

content:
RT @marquiskurt Hey #Gophers!

If you haven't seen our announcements on the GopherApp lately, we announced that the trivia night is now taking place on Sepembter 12th at 8PM EST! Topic will be international foods, and the winner will receive a $25 Starbucks gift card. We'll announce details on how it works and the Zoom link for this event here.

content:
RT @marquiskurt Hey #Gophers!

We know that the first week can get pretty hectic and troublesome, especially since new technologies are being pushed to the test as we continue online classes this semester. To give everyone some breathing room as we navigate through the first week, we’re postponing our trivia night that was supposed to take place tonight to sometime next week. We hope to see out at our event soon!

content: RT @marquiskurt I figured I'd share this here, too! Bookmarks is a feature that was introduced in Mastodon v3.1 and is something that Gopherdon has. It's a great way to save posts that you really value from people.
